mapper.select: select comr.top_level_comment_id, comr.be_replied_comment_id, comr.comment_id as reply_comment_id, com.user_id as reply_user_id, com2.user_id as be_reply_user_id, u.user_name as reply_user_name, u2.user_name as be_replied_user_name, com.comment_context, com.comment_good_nums, com.comment_time, com.comment_status FROM comment_reply as comr LEFT JOIN `comment` as com ON com.comment_id = comr.comment_id LEFT JOIN `comment` as com2 ON com2.comment_id = comr.be_replied_comment_id LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.user_id = com.user_id LEFT JOIN `user` as u2 ON u2.user_id = com2.user_id where comr.top_level_comment_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY com.comment_time DESC
